tweets.author: apewoodx
tweets.text:
everything at the end of the day is opinions

the ability to share opinions and views, and how compelling you are at it. be that via a product (the solves a problem you see in the world ideally), writing, art, social media, etc etc. 

a product, an app, a solution - is an opinion
